description.value:
1st-level artificer feature

As a Magic action while holding Tinker’s Tools, you can create one item in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of yourself, choosing the item from the following list:

  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagBallBearing]{Ball Bearings}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagBasket00000]{Basket}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagBedroll0000]{Bedroll}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagBell0000000]{Bell}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagBlanket0000]{Blanket}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagBlockandTac]{Block and Tackle}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagBucket00000]{Bucket}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagCaltrops000]{Caltrops}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagCandle00000]{Candle}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagCrowbar0000]{Crowbar}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagFlask000000]{Flask}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagJug00000000]{Jug}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagLamp0000000]{Lamp}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagNet00000000]{Net}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagOil00000000]{Oil}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagPaper000000]{Paper}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagParchment00]{Parchment}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagPole0000000]{Pole}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagPouch000000]{Pouch}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagRope0000000]{Rope}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagSack0000000]{Sack}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagShovel00000]{Shovel}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagString00000]{String}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagTinderbox00]{Tinderbox}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagTorch000000]{Torch}
  • @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbagVial0000000]{Vial}

See the rules for the item in the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.phbEquipment0000]{Player’s Handbook}. The item vanishes after 1 hour.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.
